Profile

Hello! I am Jagadeesh a Full Stack Developer working on web applications. I have been developing professionally for 3 years, I enjoy building everything from small business to rich interactive web apps.

I have a diverse set of skills, ranging from Design, to HTML+CSS+JavaScript, React Js, Redux, all the way to Node Js, Express Js, Mongodb, Mongoose, Server Deployments, Administration and have very strong experience working with OpenSource frameworks and libraries.
